item.title: The Christmas Special
item.description: I can't believe Christmas snuck up on us so fast. Enjoy your November 25th celebrations and watch out for Frosty and pieces of incinerated reindeer.
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on Nov.20, 2014

item.title: What An Awful Rap Battle
item.description: Ryan and I had a freestyle rap battle. Kaitlyn witnessed the whiteness of it all. Upbeat post-rock for the sunny day!
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on Nov.13, 2014

item.title: Wine and Funerals
item.description: Wine experts Alex and Ryan came on the show today. We talked about the proper way to enjoy pinote nore. Also Fredricton Isaac and my mom called in. Good music as always.
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on 11/6/2014

item.title: Jeevan The Hippologist, Poet
item.description: Jeevan and I listened to some delicious post-rock and talked about weird things including our poetry and also hippos.
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on Oct. 30

item.title: No Pants Broadcast
item.description: No pants broad cast with co-host George Takei Soundboard.
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on Oct. 23

item.title: Ryan Is A Robot Slave
item.description: Why did Ryan put yogurt in his hair and then eat it? More hard-hitting journalism. Aaaaand Post-Rock! lots of post rock.
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on Oct. 16

item.title: Don't Make Me A Facebook Group When I Die
item.description: How do phones work? Dont make me a facebook group when I die. Also good tunes today
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on Oct. 9

item.title: The Bachelor With Eamon
item.description: We listened to some post-rock and played the Bachelor with some great guest stars
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on Oct.2

item.title: Spirit Animals
item.description: We talk about our spirit animals and play some post-rock!
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on Sept. 25

item.title: Blind Horses Live in Studio!
item.description: I play a few post rock tunes to start the show. Blind Horses came on the show to play a live set in the studio and then they stuck around for an interview!
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on April 16, 2014

item.title: It Was Like Peeing In The Shower... Minus The Bear
item.description: Kelly Clarkson pees in the shower and other pieces of hard hitting journalism.
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on April 9, 2014

item.title: What Was Ryan's Name Again?
item.description: Dan and Ryan joined me today for an introduction to the post-rock world. Ryan was criticized for listening to Sum 41 and Blink 182. Also some of Ben's favourite post-rock songs were played as always!
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on April 2, 2014

item.title: Dead Ghosts and Black Metal
item.description: In today's show we learned that CITR is haunted and a little bit about post black metal and how it really isn't as scary as people think!
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on March 26, 2014

item.title: Whale That Went Well
item.description: Horns make me happy and my brother is listening from tomorrow while we broadcast it to whales.
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on [%DATE]

item.title: Cargo Shorts
item.description: I played some good tunes and talked about nothing in particular!
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on 12-Mar-2014

item.title: Strip-Fundraising And Introduction To Post-Rock
item.description: An introduction to the world of post-rock, with emphasis on the Canadian post-rock movement. Today's show also included fundrive information and a little thing I like to call Strip- Fundraising. And yes- I did end up walking home without pants on.
item.itunes:subtitle: Broadcast on March 5, 2014
